name: Facebook: Vancouver Canucks Theme
description:
Vancouver Canucks theme for Facebook with their official blue and green colours. Enjoy!
Note: If things are running slow for you, delete the /* BACKGROUND */ section from the userstyle. That should solve the issue.

Also, you may have noticed that this style is missing a lot of, well, style.
It's still early on in its development, but in due time, it will greatly improve. You have my word =)
